56676.<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Ciao! Welcome to Grandpa Bajeo's
house!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56677.<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>You don't look familiar. Did you come
to offer me a job because of my skill
as an engineer?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56678.<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>But alas! I'm a retired engineer and
I'm enjoying my retirement! If you
want to talk about work, no thanks.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56679.<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>What? You came here on Captain Abram's
business, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56680.<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I don't know anything about Abram! I
don't know Abram! If I say I don't
know, I don't know!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56681.バジェオに\n技師の工具かばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you give Bajeo the Engineer's
Toolbag?<yesno><close>

56682.<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I don't know Abram anymore! If I say I
don't know him, I don't know him!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56684.<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>These are my tools of the trade! And
what's this? A High-Tech Wrench in
place of a broken wrench?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56685.<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Damn! Damn you, Abram! Why did you
replace my beloved wrench? Why did you
replace my beloved wrench?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56686.<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>How attached I was to that wrench! I
used to fix it when it broke, loving
its old-fashioned goodness!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56687.<voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>What a selfish bastard!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56689.<voice 00661_00056689><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00661_00056689><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>The following is a list of the most
common problems with the<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56690.<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Don't do anything selfish. Come to
think of it, he said the same thing
when we had a fight.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56691.<voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I see. So this is how he felt.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56693.<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Abram...! Okay, okay! I'm sorry, too!
It was me who did it in the first
place!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56694.<voice 00911_00056694><start_lip_sync n0:
That's right. I screwed up the power unit at the heart of the Grand Titus, which Abram loves more than anything
else.

56695.<voice 00941_00056695><start_lip_sync n0:
When it came time for repairs, I did him a favor by developing and installing a state-of-the-art
powerplant that would allow the ship to withstand magical mist storms.

56696.<voice 00981_00056696><start_lip_sync n0:
And yet, he was angry that I had taken the liberty of turning the ship's most important feature, its rugged and
tasteful power unit, into a high-tech device!

56697.<voice 01011_00056697><start_lip_sync n0:
I was so angry at him that I left my tool bag behind and got off the ship! I was so angry that I left my tool bag
behind and got off the ship.

56698.<voice 01076_00056698><start_lip_sync n0:
I understood it when he did the same thing to me. I also learned that what you do for the best of your intentions
may offend the other person.

56699.<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Well, now we're even! I guess the bag
was Abram's way of telling you to keep
working as a clocksmith.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56700.<voice 01188_00056700><start_lip_sync n0:
Well, first of all, I'm going to start with this Engineer's Toolbag to get rid of all the work I've accumulated.
Hmm? Speaking of which...

56701.<voice 01218_00056701><start_lip_sync n0:
It's about time for the Gran Zedora Castle device. Oops! Sorry, I was talking about this side. Well then,
give my regards to Abram!

56702.<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Ciao! Welcome to the home of the
genius engineer Bajeo!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56703.<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Oh, it's you, isn't it? You're the one
who took care of me the other day.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56704.<voice 00107_00056704><start_lip_sync n0:
Abram, as usual, was not so straightforward, and went to the trouble of replacing the spanner and
delivering it to me, which was a bit of a roundabout way of getting around.

56705.<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I'm glad I got my tools back, to be
honest. The equipment at Gran Zedora
Castle was in need of maintenance!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56706.<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Perfectly good timing! Well then, give
my regards to Abram!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
